description: * Knowing what to do in an emergency may mean the difference between life and death for your dog.     * This Dog Emergency app is designed to help guide you through the important decisions about first aid, as well as how and when to transport your dog quickly and safely to a veterinary hospital or emergency facility.     * Preparing for a medical emergency involving your dog is always best accomplished before the event takes place.   FEATURES:       * This Dog Emergency app is designed to help guide you through the important decisions about first aid, as well as how and when to transport your dog quickly and safely to a veterinary hospital or emergency facility.     * This application is an emergency preparedness ready-reference for dogs.     * Just simply browse and locate the emergency type in the list and tap to read the instructions.     * The information regarding the care needed is given category wise.     * The various categories are:           o Acid Poisoning           o Anaphylaxis           o Aspergillosis           o Bloat           o Burns           o Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation(CPR)           o Choking           o Conjunctivities(Red Eyes)           o Distemper           o Electric Shock           o First Aid           o Fishhook Removal           o Fly Bites           o Fros Bite           o Hyperthermia(Heat Stroke and Heat Penetration)           o Hyperthermia           o Insect Bites           o Lymphoma           o Middle and Inner Ear Infections           o ParvoVirus           o Plague           o Pneumonia(Infection and Inflammation)           o Porcupine Quills           o Snake Bite           o Sporotrichosis (Fungal Infection)
